title: EU Threatens Temporary Measures to Stop Meta Blocking AI Rivals From WhatsApp
description: EU competition regulators have threatened to stop Meta Platforms from blocking artificial intelligence rivals from its WhatsApp messaging service while it investigates suspected abuse of a dominant position by the U.S. tech giant.
content:

title: Winners and losers from Super Bowl LX commercials
description: Super Bowl LX is in the books and the Seattle Seahawks are NFL champions for the second time. title: Pakistan's Billion-Dollar Bet on AI: A Leap into the Future
description: Pakistan plans to invest USD 1 billion in artificial intelligence by 2030. Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif announced initiatives including a new AI curriculum, PhD scholarships, and training for non-IT professionals to bolster Pakistan's AI capabilities, aiming for significant growth in the technology sector.
content: Pakistan's ambitious plan to invest USD 1 billion in artificial intelligence by 2030 marks a significant leap towards building a robust AI ecosystem. Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif emphasized the country's commitment to advancing AI during the Indus A... [686 chars]

title: Workday names co-founder Aneel Bhusri as CEO in AI-driven shift
description: Workday said on Monday co-founder Aneel Bhusri will return as the company's CEO, replacing Carl Eschenbach, as the human resources software provider looks to leverage artificial intelligence and shore up demand.
content:
Shares of the company fell 5% in early trading after the announcement, which is effective immediately.

title: Atomesus AI Whitepaper: Building India's Intelligent Future
description: New Delhi [India], February 9: Artificial intelligence is rapidly becoming the foundational infrastructure of the modern economy -- shaping how people learn, work, create, and solve problems. title: Takeda deepens AI drug discovery push with $1.7 billion Iambic deal
description: Iambic and Takeda Pharmaceutical have formed a multi-year partnership valued at over $1.7 billion. This collaboration will leverage artificial intelligence to accelerate the design of small-molecule drugs for cancer and gastrointestinal diseases. Iambic's AI model, NeuralPLexer, will be utilised to predict drug molecule binding to proteins.
